extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManualPage

        public ManualPage(java.lang.Object recipe,
                  ManualPage.PageType page)
        Constructs a page with custom ManualPage.PageType and recipe. This will use custom rendering for the page.
        Parameters:
        recipe - The custom recipe to be displayed.
        page - The page that will handle rendering for this recipe(s).

      • ManualPage

        public ManualPage(java.lang.String text)
        Constructs a page with simple text. This value will be translated later.
        Parameters:
        text - The I18n key. Use as template: "MOD_ID.manual_desc.ENTRY_ID.PAGE_NUMBER".

      • ManualPage

        public ManualPage(java.lang.String text,
                  net.minecraft.item.ItemStack output)
        Constructs a new page with text, and an output association.
        Parameters:
        text - The I18n key. Use as template: "MOD_ID.manual_desc.ENTRY_ID.PAGE_NUMBER".
        output - The associated output to this page.

      • ManualPage

        public ManualPage(java.lang.String research,
                  java.lang.String text)
        WIP feature.
        Allows to render text in galactic font instead, if player doesn't have required knowledge.
        Parameters:
        research - The knowledge ID to be required to read this page.
        text - The I18n key. Use as template: "MOD_ID.manual_desc.ENTRY_ID.PAGE_NUMBER".

      • ManualPage

        public ManualPage(java.util.List recipe)
        Constructs a page with multiblock structure.
        Parameters:
        recipe - The list that represents the multiblock structure.

      • ManualPage

        public ManualPage(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack input)
        Constructs a new page with smelting recipe.
        Parameters:
        input - The smelting input.

      • ManualPage

        public ManualPage(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation image,
                  java.lang.String caption)
        Constructs a new page that will have an image and a caption.
        Parameters:
        image - The image to be rendered.
        caption - The caption after the image.

      • ManualPage

        public ManualPage(ManualPage.PageType type,
                  net.minecraft.item.ItemStack item)
        Allows for creating a page with ManualPage.PageType.NORMAL_CRAFTING and ManualPage.PageType.SMELTING.
        Parameters:
        type - The page type. May be 1 of those above.
        item - The recipe output, if crafting. The smelting input, if smelting.
